name: Hardware Equipment and Supplies
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Wholesale distributors of general hardware and blades. Products for
sale may include bolts, nuts, rivets, screws, fasteners, hand tools,
locks, washers, tacks, staples, nails, hand saws, saw blades, and
power hand tools.
For retailers that sell hardware, use MCC 5251.
